Class View

java.lang.Object
com.example.simple.jira.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppView
public class View extends Object implements AppView
Console based view responsible for presenting information to the user The view renders projects, tasks, and menus while delegating input collection to the controller
Version:
1.0
Author:
michalkubina
